channel.title: take on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in take on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-20
item.description: Altos bursts out of stealth with $3B, a dream team C-suite and a wildly ambitious plan to reverse disease (3 minute read) Altos Labs is a biotech company that is developing technology that could revitalize cells and reverse disease, ultimately prolonging human life.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-19
item.description: Microsoft to acquire Activision Blizzard for $68.7 billion (3 minute read) Microsoft is acquiring Activision Blizzard in a deal valued at $68.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-17
item.description: Wikipedia wants to charge Google, Amazon, and Apple for using its content (3 minute read) The Wikimedia Foundation behind Wikipedia has created a new division called Wikimedia Enterprise, which will provide commercial products that tailor Wikipedia’s content for publication on services provided by Big Tech companies.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-26
item.description: Amazon’s latest AR shopping tool fills your space with virtual furniture (1 minute read) Room Decorator is Amazon’s new AR shopping tool.
